bike.description: C4 carbon w/ shaped TT for portaging, integrated tapered head tube w/ 1 1/2" lower, oversized 34.9mm round seat tube, PIIS BB-86 shell, double water bottle mounts
sizes: S (49cm), S/M (52cm), M (54cm), M/L (56cm), L (58cm), XL (61cm)

components.description: C4 carbon seat stays, oversized chainstay and carbon dropout w/ replaceable hanger
FC-440 carbon monocoque w/ tapered steerer & carbon dropout
Shimano Ultegra STI shifter/brake combo, 20-speed Flight Deck compatible
Oval 535 aero alloy, 35mm rims, DT Swiss Competition spokes 20/24H, sealed bearing hubs
Oval 1 1/8"U - 1 1/2"L integrated w/ alloy top cover
Selle Italia XR w/ FeC alloy rails
